thread.title: Hillary Clinton apologizes for e-mail system: ‘I take responsibility’
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton apologizes for e-mail system: ‘I take responsibility’

title: Hillary Clinton apologizes for e-mail system: ‘I take responsibility’
text:
09 Hillary Clinton apologizes for e-mail system: ‘I take responsibility’ 
The Washington Post: A day after again declining to apologize for her use of a private e-mail system while she was secretary of state, Hillary Rodham Clinton told an interviewer Tuesday that the arrangement was a mistake and that she is "sorry" for it.“As I look back at it now, even though it was allowed, I should have used two accounts. That was a mistake. I’m sorry about that. I take responsibility,” Clinton said in an interview with ABC News.
